Text: Sorry, main guest is Morgan Freeman. The interbridge listing was wrong. Apologies.

No problem. That Interbridge site where you got the info did have it wrong, but it's still great and I always use it to find out who's gonna be on the show. Sometimes they'll edit the listing at the last minute.

The only difference between Morgan Freeman and Michael Caine is:

Caine's best imitator is Craig Ferguson. Freeman's best imitator is Ferguson's sidekick Geoff Peterson.
Letterman (and Conan) torrents are hard to find lately.
Any chance you can post the rest of this week's shows? Usually you post all three on Friday, but no luck this time around. Please don't stop your Letterman torrents!
do you happen to have the episode with Roseanne Barr?  Thanks!  :)
